titleStmt.title: The scourge of corruption. Or A crafty knaue needs no broker. Written by Anthony Nixon
titleStmt.author: Nixon, Anthony.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By John Beale] for Henry Gosson, and William Houlmes, and are to be sold at his shop in Popes-head Pallace,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
